attributes.action: Save our ... Life or Death ... EMERGENCY... red pull cord, community ALARMS  in our HOMES!
attributes.additional_details:
Birmingham City Council ... Department: Supporting People Team.
have STOPPED, the funding for our ALARM SERVICE from April 2013.

This WILL affect, hundreds if not THOUSANDS of
White, Black,         Muslim, Jewish and Christian  DISABLED people, living in SHELTERED ACCOMMODATION ... through out the West Midlands.

In my building, the age range is between 55 to 87 years OLD.     all living under 1 roof in harmony.

A very old, white lady, who goes around with a ZIMMER FRAME.            And a black man with NO LEGS.

         FROM APRIL 2013.     THE AGENCY! RESPONSIBLE FOR AND RESPONDING TO ... DISTRESS CALLS ... WILL BE CUT!!!

OVERTURN ... THIS FILTHY DECISION ... BY     BIRMINGHAM CITY COUNCIL.

thank you, for looking, I need your help.   PLEASE   VOTE!        philip whittle
